name: laravilt-panel
description: MCP Server for Laravilt Panel Package Documentation

metadata.description: Provides access to Laravilt Panel package documentation

resources.name: Laravilt Panel Documentation
resources.description: Complete documentation for the Laravilt Panel package

resources.name: MCP Server Integration Guide
resources.description: Guide for MCP server integration and generator commands

resources.name: Panel API Reference
resources.description: Complete API reference for Panel configuration

tools.name: search_panel_docs
tools.description: Search the Laravilt Panel documentation for specific topics

tools.name: get_panel_config
tools.description: Get panel configuration options and examples

tools.name: list_panel_methods
tools.description: List all available Panel methods and their signatures

tools.name: get_page_example
tools.description: Get example code for creating custom pages

tools.name: list_panels
tools.description: List all available panels in the application

tools.name: panel_info
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific panel

tools.name: generate_panel
tools.description: Generate a new panel with scaffolding. Uses: php artisan laravilt:panel {id} [--path=]

path.description: Custom URL path for the panel (defaults to /{id})

tools.name: generate_page
tools.description: Generate a new page for a panel. Uses: php artisan laravilt:page {panel} {name}

name.description: Page name (can include subdirectories like Users/Profile)

tools.name: generate_resource
tools.description: Generate a complete CRUD resource from a database table. Uses: php artisan laravilt:resource {panel} [--table=] [--model=]

model.description: Custom model name (defaults to singular StudlyCase of table)

tools.name: list_resources
tools.description: List all resources in a panel

tools.name: resource_info
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific resource

tools.name: get_icon_mapping
tools.description: Get the icon name for a table/model name based on keyword mapping

keyword.description: Table or model name to look up icon for
